price: Why should I not worship the One Who created me and to Whom you will all be brought back?
arabic: وَمَالِيَ لَآ أَعۡبُدُ ٱلَّذِي فَطَرَنِي وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
